title: Space.log
content:
+ <!-- more --> This log is designed to track our progresses in astronomy and space-exploration. I will try to include all important space-related missions and updates from countires all over the world. Also, links to specfic mission's overviews and reports will be included. Update constantly.        
---                                   

***Mankind was born on earth.***
***It was never meant to die here.***
          *- Joseph Cooper, Interstaller*
---    


*Start from 2021.04.12, the 60th International Day of Space Flight.*
*Unless labeled specifically, all time is based on UTC.*

## 2021.05.14 23:18
China's 1st Mars exploration rover, [天问一号 (Tianwen-1)](http://www.cnsa.gov.cn/english/n6465652/n6465653/c6812005/content.html), successfully landed on Mars
##### 2021.05.19 (UTC +8:00) landing visuals sent back.


## 2021.05.11
NASA's asteroid explorer [OSIRIS-REx](https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-s-osiris-rex-spacecraft-heads-for-earth-with-asteroid-sample) started its return trip to Earth with samples from asteroid Bennu. Planned to reach Earth on 2023.09.24

## 2021.05.05
SpaceX's Starship [SN15](https://www.spacex.com/updates/starship-sn15-flight-test/index.html) successfully landed after the test flight. 

## 2021.04.29 11:23 (UTC +8:00)
China's new space station's core module, [天和 (Tianhe)](http://www.cnsa.gov.cn/english/n6465652/n6465653/c6811970/content.html), was successfully launched and entered planned orbit. 


## 2021.04.27 11:23 (UTC +8:00)
China's space company Origin Space launched the first prototype mining spacecraft, NEO-1, on Long March 6 rocket.


## 2021.04.23 09:49
In [Crew-2](https://blogs.nasa.gov/commercialcrew/tag/crew-2/) mission, SpaceX successfully launched the Crew Dragon spacecraft carrying four astronauts into space. 
##### 2021.04.24 09:08 Endeavor docked with ISS.
##### 2021.04.24 11:15 Hatch opened


## 2021.04.19 07:34
NASA's Mars Helicopter, Ingenuity, successfully completed its [first flight](https://www.space.com/mars-helicopter-ingenuity-first-flight-success) attempt on Mars.

##### 2021.04.22  2nd attempt complete
##### 2021.04.25  3rd attempt complete
##### 2021.04.30  4th attempt complete
##### 2021.05.07  5th attempt complete

title: T-minus 0
content:
+ <!-- more --> ...T-minus 3, 2, 1. Ignition and lift-off!                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   
---

So good to see you! This is the launching post of my blog. Not a grand project, just sharing my interests and ideas (daily hassles as well) in computer science, math, astronomy, and other artistic topics. Hope this blog will carry some interesting stuff I found and from me through a long time, as long as possible. ヽ(✿ﾟ▽ﾟ)ノ

#### Notes 
##### Useful sources that helped me build this website: [start-up](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1pt411K7o9?p=6&t=80), [theme](https://zhih.me/hexo-casper-usage/)
